html:
ABUJA, Jan 5 (Reuters) - Shares of Airtel Africa AAF.L hit an all-time high on Wednesday, lifting the main stock index, after the mobile phone company said it will use proceeds of a tower sale to reduce debt.


(Reporting by Chijioke Ohuochaand Louise Heavens)

(( chijioke.ohuocha@thomsonreuters.com ; +234 703 4180 621; Reuters Messaging: chijioke.ohuocha.thomsonreuters@reuters.net ))

Keywords: NIGERIA-AIRTEL AFRICA/STOCKS (URGENT)
